channel.title: Earnings Surprise on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Earnings Surprise on FinanClub

item.title: SLB
item.description: score:65 Chances: Double-digit jump in revenue in Q2 2023 due to rebounding oil and gas prices. Positive Q2 earnings surprises and growth potential. Awarded a five-year contract for Petrobras’ digital transformation. Strong performance in the energy sector and resilient stock. Trending stock with optimistic outlook from Wall Street analysts.

item.title: D
item.description: score:111 Chances: Encouragement for homeowners and contractors to call 811 for utility line marking. Dividend payment of $0.6675 scheduled for September 20. Second-quarter earnings per share better than guidance due to lower operating expenses. Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind project on budget and track for completion.

item.title: TPR
item.description: score:-55 Chances: Tapestry’s strong portfolio consisting of Coach, Kate Spade, and Stuart Weitzman brands. Positive earnings surprise history and favorable ingredients for potential quarterly beat. Risks: Integration challenges and execution risks associated with the acquisition of Capri Holdings. Mixed response from Wall Street and the industry to the acquisition deal.

item.title: ARRY
item.description: score:1294 Chances: Array Technologies’ Q2 results may show increased megawatts shipment and strong margin performance from STI Norland acquisition. Array Technologies has an impressive earnings surprise history and a favorable combination for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. The growth of solar energy and technological advancements create opportunities for solar stocks, including Array Technologies.
